content: I don't patronize, I realize, I'm losing and this is my real life. I am half asleep, and I am wide awake. This habit is always so hard to break. I don't want to be the bad guy, I've been blaming myself and I think you know why. I'm killing time and time's killing you every way that I do. Did you say, "Please just follow me"? I thought you wanted me 'cause I want you all to myself. I can try and suck it up, I just can't suck it up. Make me feel like some one else.
author: Marianas Trench
